name: CupertinoFullscreenDialogTransition
desc: An iOS-style transition used for summoning fullscreen dialogs.

fields.name: primaryRouteAnimation
fields.desc: * `primaryRouteAnimation` is a linear route animation from 0.0 to 1.0    when this screen is being pushed.

fields.name: secondaryRouteAnimation
fields.desc: * `secondaryRouteAnimation` is a linear route animation from 0.0 to 1.0    when another screen is being pushed on top of this one.

fields.name: linearTransition
fields.desc: * `linearTransition` is whether to perform the transitions linearly.    Used to precisely track back gesture drags.

fields.name: child
fields.desc: The widget below this widget in the tree.
